challenges.name: What is Reinforcement Learning?
challenges.description: Reinforcement learning is an area of machine learning that uses a system of reward and punishments. A reinforcement learning algorithm otherwise known as an agent, learns by interacting with an environment. The agent receives rewards by performing actions correctly and it gets penalties for performing incorrectly. The agent learns without intervention from a human by maximizing its reward and minimizing its penalty. That way you can train the computer to do something all on its own.

challenges.name: Reinforcement Learning Agent
challenges.description: Reinforcement learning agent interacts with an environment in steps, the agent receives an observation which typically has the reward and penalty. The goal of the reinforcement learning agent is to collect as much reward as possible so that it can train itself without any labelled data.
